bibl.title: Letter from O.C. Merrill to the Secretary of the Public Health Service, December 13, 1920

div1.p: Merrill discusses regulations under Federal Water Power Act.

div1.head: Letter from O.C. Merrill to the Secretary of the Public Health Service, December 13, 1920
div1.opener:
COPY Secretary of War, Chairman
Secretary of the Interior
Secretary of Agriculture
O.C. Merrill, Executive
Secretary.
FEDERAL POWER COMMISSION
Washington
December {13, 1920.}
Cooperation
Public Health Service
Dear Mr. Secretary:
div1.p:
Acknowledgement is made of the Assistant Secretary's
letter of December 9, concerning certain regulations under the
Federal Water Power Act proposed by the Public Health Service.
I am glad to have the amended draft submitted by the Assistant
Secretary and assure you that it will be given full consideration
in preparing the regulations of the Commission.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, (Signed) O. C. Merrill
Executive Secretary. The Honorable,
The Secretary of the Treasury.
